description:
exp/sql: add time.Time support

Fixes issue 2694

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On Fri, Jan 13, 2012 at 3:39 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM
>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**5541057/diff/2001/src/pkg/exp/**
> sql/sql_test.go<http://codereview.appspot.com/5541057/diff/2001/src/pkg/exp/sql/sql_test.go>
> File src/pkg/exp/sql/sql_test.go (right):
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**5541057/diff/2001/src/pkg/exp/**
> sql/sql_test.go#newcode16<http://codereview.appspot.com/5541057/diff/2001/src/pkg/exp/sql/sql_test.go#newcode16>
> src/pkg/exp/sql/sql_test.go:**16: var chrisBirthday = time.Unix(123456789,
> 0)
> who's chris? interesting date (nov 29 1973)
>

My test userids 1, 2, and 3 are alphabetically alice, bob, and chris, just
as a little mnemonic.


http://codereview.appspot.com/**5541057/diff/2001/src/pkg/exp/**
> sql/sql_test.go#newcode120<http://codereview.appspot.com/5541057/diff/2001/src/pkg/exp/sql/sql_test.go#newcode120>
> src/pkg/exp/sql/sql_test.go:**120: t.Errorf("chris birthday = %v, %v; want
>
> %v", birthday, err, chrisBirthday)
> maybe for the second %v
>
> err = %v
>
> otherwise a surprising nil may arise
>

Done.

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5541057/diff/2001/src/pkg/exp/sql/sql_test.go
File src/pkg/exp/sql/sql_test.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5541057/diff/2001/src/pkg/exp/sql/sql_test.go#newcode16
src/pkg/exp/sql/sql_test.go:16: var chrisBirthday = time.Unix(123456789, 0)
who's chris? interesting date (nov 29 1973)

http://codereview.appspot.com/5541057/diff/2001/src/pkg/exp/sql/sql_test.go#newcode120
src/pkg/exp/sql/sql_test.go:120: t.Errorf("chris birthday = %v, %v; want %v", birthday, err, chrisBirthday)
maybe for the second %v

err = %v

otherwise a surprising nil may arise

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=03beb4e51444 ***

exp/sql: add time.Time support

Fixes issue 2694

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5541057

subject: code review 5541057: exp/sql: add time.Time support
